short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sorts tabs in the current Chrome window by website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Master is a powerful Chrome extension designed to make managing your browser tabs a breeze. With a clean and user-friendly interface, this extension provides a collection of handy tools that help you organize, sort, and navigate your open tabs with ease.

Features:

Refresh: Automatically sort all open tabs alphabetically by website name, keeping your browsing experience organized and clutter-free.
Duplicate Check: Scan your open tabs for duplicates, close them, and then sort the remaining tabs alphabetically by website name.
High to Low: Sort your tabs by the number of opened instances for each website, placing the ones with the highest number of opened tabs first.
Playing: Instantly navigate to the tab where the audio is currently playing. If multiple tabs are playing audio, you'll be taken to the first one.
With Tab Master, you'll save time and enhance your productivity while browsing the web. Say goodbye to tab chaos and enjoy a more organized and efficient browsing experience. Install Tab Master today and take control of your tabs!
